title: Tech group wants new visa to allow skilled workers to enter Canada without a job offer - Canada Immigration News
content: Tech group wants new visa to allow skilled workers to enter Canada without a job offer  Canada Immigration News
description: To help address labour shortages in the tech sector, the Council of Canadian Innovators is calling on the federal government to pilot a new visa that would allow high-skilled tech workers to come to Canada without a job offer. The CCI recently released its Talent and Skills Strategy, offering 13 key recommendations for policymakers to [â€¦]
